title: EvolutionHub Documentation Registry
description: Schema for the generated documentation inventory covering Markdown, AsciiDoc and plaintext assets.

generatedAt.description: ISO-8601 timestamp indicating when the registry was produced.

generatedBy.description: CLI identifier that produced this registry snapshot.

sourceRoot.description: Absolute path on disk used as the root when scanning documentation files.

documents.description: List of documentation artefacts discovered in the repository.

path.description: Repository relative file path to the documentation asset.

title.description: Best effort document title resolved from frontmatter or first heading.

description.description: Optional short summary extracted from the body content.

format.description: Document format inferred from the file extension.

hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the raw file contents for change detection.

headings.description: Ordered list of headings discovered within the document.
